phrases: From One Year to the Next
I would like to do some kind of event.
Something to bring in more customers.
Why do not we put on another play on Christmas Eve, then?
It would be the Hitotose Troupe's second performance!
But we do not have much time until Christmas,
so we probably will not be able to do one as big as last time.
We will not have time to practice.
A short play is fine, too!
I bet our second play will go even better than the first!
For the end of the year...
maybe it should be more of a Christmas story.
A tragic love story between Santa Claus and a reindeer.
A revenge drama about Prince Santa Claus driven mad with the need for vengeance.
Um, what do those have to do with Christmas,
other than having Santa and a reindeer?
I will have to start preparing the costumes right away!
I cannot wait until the costume fitting!
You will need dresses, too, right?
Like I said before, we will not have much time,
so I was thinking of borrowing costumes from the theater club.
Okay, then, how about something based on A Christmas Carol?
On Christmas Eve night, a cruel, miserly girl is haunted by a ghost,
who asks Santa Claus and his reindeer for a certain gift...
You will not budge on Santa and the reindeer, huh?
Wait, but if it has that many characters,
will not we be short on actors?
We have the landlady, Hina-chan, and Yua-chan, right?
If we can get a real reindeer, we should be able to manage.
If a regular deer will work instead of a reindeer, I might be able to get one.
Animals do like Hina-chan, after all.
Do you think you could summon Santa while you are at it?!
I-If you think my grandpa would be good enough...
Oh, I do not know if I can act...
Hina-chan, you do not need to worry about it that much.
We are doing a play on Christmas Eve, right?
Let me help... you... with that...
I went straight to the theater club to borrow costumes!
And I also came up with a practice schedule!
I think it will fit, but it is a little different from normal costumes, so...
I-It fit perfectly when I tried it on...
Is this what you call an unequal bodily society?
We will be holding a play on the 24th!
It will be really fun, so please come!
The Hitotose Troupe December 24 Mini Drama
Place: Coffee Shop Hitotose Starting at 5:00 PM
You are putting on another play at Hitotose Manor?
We hope you will come watch it, too!
What kind of play is it?
It is based on A Christmas Carol.
We will have a real deer.
You really did call a deer.
take the deer with you to draw in customers, okay?
W-We will be holding a play here in our shop today!
Wh-Why did I have to dress like this, too?
The deer's doing all the work.
Yeah, it is a full house!
Your play is getting a good response.
I cannot grant the wish of a miser like you!
No, it is not so much the play.
I beseech thee, grant her wish!
and the deer that are popular.
So you actually have a real deer in the play.
Next time, I will try to win people over with the actual story!
Maybe I will try to use that in my next drama script.
Everyone, since this was your second performance,
your acting felt much more natural than in the first.
Well, that is to be expected!
Being praised by Sensei really gives me an appetite!
It should give you inspiration, not an appetite!
Well, I will have to take my leave now.
There is still lots of cake and other things left.
You need to go home and get to bed, or Santa will not come, right?
I will go to bed early today, too!
Hina-chan, do you actually still believe in Santa?
I need to go home and get to bed early,
or Santa Claus will not come.
Do not forget to hang your stocking!
Mayu-chan, I will go buy presents later.
We do not want to crush Hina-chan's dreams.
You usually get all nervous and stiffen up.
I have been doing theater in Tokyo,
so I do not get nervous as easily anymore.
That is why I can talk this normally to people now!
I will not let anyone call me a scarecrow...
It is the first sunrise of the year!
Kuu-chan, you are so energetic this early in the morning.
Well, the start of a new year brings all kinds of firsts!
All you are doing is eating.
Oh, by the way, you were in my first dream of the year, Mayu-chan.
A giant Mayu-chan looking down on Mt. Fuji.
But Mt. Fuji was actually a miniature,
and you were actually even smaller than you are in real life.
Do you all have any goals for the coming year?
My goal is to read 300 books this year!
I am going to work on my acting.
I guess mine is still to be able to talk in front of people without getting nervous.
And mine is to keep supporting Hina-chan and the others as their senpai.
I want to get the coffee shop's business on the right track, too.
She is drinking so much milk...
I guess what she really wants to do is get taller.
Please continue to support Coffee Shop Hitotose this year!
We are going to visit our families.
We will be back in about two days, though.
Will not you just spend all that time on trains and buses?
They are only about an hour away.
Where in the countryside does Hina-chan live, exactly?
We will be going now, Hina-chan.
We will be back before you know it.
If you get lonely, just imagine this doll is me.
And I will send this little one with you in return.
I cannot take something that is alive...
Here, I will give you this book!
I would rather not take something half-eaten...
Miss Landlady, I will help you!
It is so quiet with both of them gone, is not it?
The conversation is not going anywhere!
I have to think of something she would enjoy talking about!
If there is one thing I know she likes, it is theater.
But I do not know that much about theater...
I do not really know anything about her at all, do I?!
So, what do you want to know?
When she puts it that way, there are too many things I would like to ask...
Like how she moves her body so gracefully,
or how she prepares physically for each of her roles...
I want to know about your body!
Um, so what do you like, other than theater?
When I was little, I had a golden hamster.
It was so small, and its eyes were so round,
and its golden fur was so soft...
Golden hamsters really are cute, are not they?
That sounds like something I have seen before...
I am leaving for my part-time job this afternoon.
I go and help a friend of mine who likes theater.
And what kind of work is it?
I will have a chance to overcome my nervousness right from the start of the year!
This is not what I had envisioned...
The landlady really does look good in anything she wears, though.
All the men here cannot take their eyes off of her.
I am working here with the landlady.
She gets to see Chiaki-senpai in her miko outfit up close...
Oh, did you come to see the landlady?
Then why do not you go talk to her instead of sneaking around?
It is a fan's job to watch over her from the shadows!
She said she was looking at you in your miko outfit.
Want to try being a miko with us, Yua-chan?
I get to see Chiaki-senpai in her miko outfit up close!
Are you sure we do not need to ask the priest?
I think it will be fine.
Having two cute mikos should bring in more visitors.
Do not put unnecessary pressure on me!
Did you eat lots of mochi?
The landlady talks a lot more than I realized.
She is really outgoing with young kids.
I guess she does talk a lot with Mayu-chan and Kuu-chan.
Thanks for helping me today, you two.
It does not bother me at all.
I am happy you feel that way.
I am glad I got to know the landlady better today, even if it was just a little.
I have a feeling I will be able to talk with her even more tomorrow.
Mayu-chan's doll is all wet with my drool...
You really love Mayu, do not you?
In three months, I will have been here for a year.
I was not sure how it would go at first,
but then I met everyone, started our theater troupe,
I was in the play at our culture festival, too,
and the Hitotose Troupe had its first performance.
But I think it is all helped me grow up a little bit...
I will keep trying my best at everything!
Let us all eat them right now!
Should not we put our things away first?
Eating the year's first souvenir takes priority!
Eating really is all you ever do, is not it?
Let us hurry and eat these!
The Place We Longed to Reach
I came to Hitotose Manor because I wanted to change myself,
and I met precious friends there who can never be replaced.
I will keep working toward my goal along with all the people I love!
Next time, The Place We Longed to Reach.
